pdfset:
<#if record.class == 'Connect : Step'>
<#setting number_format=",##0.00"> <#assign currencySymbol>${record.custbody_bbs_currency_symbol}</#assign> <#assign logoInfo>https://5423837-sb1.app.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=1942&c=5423837_SB1&h=1e9c8c9c705d4925337f</#assign>
<#if .locale == "zh_CN">
<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
</#if>
SERVICE ORDER
THIS SERVICES AGREEMENT ("SERVICE ORDER") IS MADE BETWEEN:
${subsidiary.name}, a company registered in ${subsidiary.mainaddress_text?keep_after_last('>')}, company number ${subsidiary.custrecord_bbs_company_no} and whose registered office is at ${subsidiary.mainaddress_text?replace('
', ' ')} (Company)
AND
${record.entity}, a company registered in ${record.billaddress?keep_after_last('>')}, company number ${record.entity.custentity_bbs_company_reg_no} and whose registered office is at ${record.billaddress?replace('
', ' ')} (Customer)
After signature of this Service Order by both parties, Company shall provide Customer with the Services set out in this Service Order for the Term in accordance with the Master Service Agreement terms (set out at https://essensys.tech/our-terms). The Services shall be provided at the Premises set out in this Service Order for the Charges set out below.
DRAFT
Additional Defined Terms to be incorporated into the MSA (set out at (https://essensys.tech/our-terms)
Access means primary and backup point-to-point Layer 2 circuits provided by essensys using Tier 1 telecommunications carriers. Access is available in bandwidths from 100Mbps to 10Gbps.
Active Area means an area of the Building either being the Common Parts or an area demised to an occupier and provided with any Service by essensys measured in Square Feet (Active Square Foot) or Square Meter (Active Square Meter). Areas measured for this purpose should be based upon the RSF.
Common Parts means all areas, within the Building from time to time as may be reasonably designated for the common use of any of the Occupiers of the building.
Marketplace Services variable services available to Customer charged on consumption.
Occupier means a person or company residing in or using the building as its owner or tenant.
Site Hardware means any goods, products or materials sold to Customer by Supplier pursuant to a Service Order.
Software means the current SaaS applications branded Operate and Connect and any future application or derivative supplied by Supplier.
STEP Activation Fee a one-time fee for Site Hardware and associated services required to enable an area of a building to become an Active Area.
STEP Software Fee agreed amount per Active Square Foot or Active Square Meter expressed as an Annual fee, but charged monthly in arrears, subject always to a minimum chargeable Active Area of 4,950 Active Square Feet. Any area that becomes an Active Area in any Calendar month will be chargeable from the day that it becomes Active until the day that it ceases to be an Active Area.
Rentable Square Foot (RSF) means the verified measurement of the space or square footage occupied, not including any Common Parts.
Visitor means a person that makes a visit to the Building, where they are not an occupier. The visit is usually temporary.
<#setting number_format=",##0.00"> <#assign currencySymbol>${record.custbody_bbs_currency_symbol}</#assign> <#assign logoInfo>https://5423837-sb1.app.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=1942&c=5423837_SB1&h=1e9c8c9c705d4925337f</#assign>

The Premises means the following building:
<#if record.custbody_bbs_premises_json?length gt 0> <#assign premises_summary = record.custbody_bbs_premises_json?eval> <#if premises_summary?has_content>
<#list premises_summary as premises> <#if premises_index==0>
Name Address City State/
Province Postcode/
Zip code
</#if>
${premises.name} ${premises.address1}
${premises.address2}
${premises.address3} ${premises.city} ${premises.state} ${premises.zip}
</#list>
</#if> </#if>
Total Number of Premises: ${record.custbody_site_count?string.number}
<#if record.custbody_bbs_order_type != 'Equipment'>
Term
Effective Date ${record.custbody_so_term?string.number} <#if record.custbody_so_term == 1>month<#else>months</#if> from the Commencement Date
</#if>
Payment Terms
50% of STEP Activation Fees are invoiced upon signature of this Services Order and require payment within seven days. The remaining 50% is invoiced upon completion of the project and is required within seven days. Monthly fees require payment within 30 days of invoice.
<#if record.custbody_bbs_order_type != 'Equipment'>
Fees: Subscription Services - Fixed Recurring
essensys Connect Fixed Recurring Fees are invoiced Monthly in Advance. First invoice is at Commencement Date.
<#if record.item?has_content>
Services Monthly Fee
<#list record.item as item> <#if item.custcol_bbs_setup_fee == false>
${item.description} ${currencySymbol}${item.rate}
</#if> </#list>
</#if>
Fees: essensys STEP Software Fee – Monthly Variable
essensys STEP Software Fees are invoiced monthly in arrears based on the Active Area at a rate of one twelfth of the Annual Fee below subject to a minimum charge of $412.50 per month ($4,950 per annum).
Description Unit Annual Fee
STEP Software Fee Per Active Square Foot per Annum ${currencySymbol}1.00
</#if>
<#setting number_format=",##0.00"> <#assign currencySymbol>${record.custbody_bbs_currency_symbol}</#assign> <#assign logoInfo>https://5423837-sb1.app.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=1942&c=5423837_SB1&h=1e9c8c9c705d4925337f</#assign>

Fees: Marketplace Items - Monthly Variable
essensys STEP Marketplace Services are invoiced Monthly in Arrears based on consumption as set out below:
Description Unit Fee Per Unit
Internet Fee ${currencySymbol} per MB ${currencySymbol}0.25
Voice User Extension ${currencySymbol}15.00
Analogue Line Line ${currencySymbol}10.00
Conference Bridge Extension ${currencySymbol}10.00
Conference Bridge Additional DID Extension ${currencySymbol}10.00
Call Recording Extension ${currencySymbol}30.00
Fax to Email Extension ${currencySymbol}15.00
Basic IVR IVR ${currencySymbol}20.00
Enhanced IVR IVR ${currencySymbol}60.00
Public IP Address (single publicly routable RIPE address) IP Address ${currencySymbol}10.00
Fees: essensys STEP Activation
Activation fees are charged for equipment and services to enable part of the Premises to become an Active Area and are invoiced:
● 50% upon signing of the relevant Service Order
● 50% within 7 days of Commencement Date
The initial area of the Premises to become an Active Area and the Activation Fees to be charged by the Company and paid by the Customer are as follows:
<#if record.item?has_content>
Quantity Item Fee ${currencySymbol}
<#list record.item as item> <#if item.custcol_bbs_setup_fee == true>
${item.quantity?string.number} ${item.description} ${currencySymbol}${item.amount}
</#if> </#list>
</#if>
Separate Service Orders for Activation Fees will be signed in respect of any additional areas of the Premises requested by the Customer to become an Active Area.

<#if record.custbody_bbs_order_type != 'Equipment'>
Fees: Subscription Services - Fixed Recurring
Connect and Operate Fixed Recurring Fees are invoiced Monthly in Advance. First invoice is at Commencement Date.
<#if record.item?has_content>
${record.class} Recurring Monthly Fee
<#list record.item as item> <#if item.custcol_bbs_setup_fee == false>
${item.description} ${currencySymbol}${item.custcol_bbs_recurring_monthly_fee}
</#if> </#list>
</#if>
The Connect Service Description is available at https://essensys.tech/connect-service-description
The Connect SLA is available at https://essensys.tech/connect-sla
<#if record.custbody_bbs_order_type != 'Operate'>
Fees: Connect On-Demand Marketplace Services - Monthly Variable Recurring
Connect Variable Recurring Fees are invoiced Monthly in Arrears based on Services provisioned in the Connect Software as set out below.
Connect Growth Edition On-Demand Marketplace Description Unit Fee Per Month
Additional per Mb/s above ZMbps allocated Internet Mbps (Prices change by edition)
Voice User – Premium (with Local, Geographic and Mobile Call Discount) User (Prices change by edition)
Analogue Line (with Local, Geographic and Mobile Call Discount) Number (Prices change by edition)
Fax to Email (inbound only) Number (Prices change by edition)
Voice User - Virtual Number (Prices change by edition)
Softphone (standalone requires voice user) User (Prices change by edition)
Voice Call Charges Minutes (Prices change by edition)
Call Recording User (Prices change by edition)
Auto Attendant Single Level IVR (Prices change by edition)
Auto Attendant Multiple Levels IVR (Prices change by edition)
Public IP Address (Single publicly routable RIPE address) IP Address (Prices change by edition)
Public IP Address (5 publicly routable RIPE Address) 5 IP Address (Prices change by edition)
Custom Music on Hold Music File (Prices change by edition)
Conference Call Account Account (Prices change by edition)
Evo Operator Console (not provisioned in Connect Software) Premises (Prices change by edition)
</#if>
</#if>
<#if record.custbody_bbs_number_of_setup_items gt 0>
Fees: ${record.class} Setup Services
Setup service fees are invoiced:
1. 50% upon Service Order Agreement
2. 50% upon Commencement Date
Risks in hardware pass to Customer on dispatch. Title for these items will pass to Customer on the latter of:
(1) Installation thereof and
(2) Receipt of all payments due in respect thereof by Company
<#if record.item?has_content> <#assign onBoardingTotal = 0>
Quantity Item <#if record.custbody_bbs_order_type != 'Equipment'>Fee per Month<#else>Amount</#if>
<#list record.item as item> <#if item.custcol_bbs_setup_fee == true>
${item.quantity?string.number} ${item.description}
<#assign onBoardingTotal += item.amount> </#if> </#list>
Total Onboarding ${currencySymbol}${onBoardingTotal}
<#if record.custbody_bbs_order_type == 'Equipment' && subsidiary.id != "2">
Estimated Taxes ${currencySymbol}${record.taxtotal}
</#if>
</#if>
</#if>
Special Terms
<#if record.custbody_bbs_sales_order_special_terms?has_content>${record.custbody_bbs_sales_order_special_terms}<#else>None</#if>
Agreement
Upon signing (or clicking the order button) this Order Form, the Customer acknowledges that it has read, understood and agrees to be bound by the terms of this MSA which consists of:
1. Service Order
2. Terms and Conditions: https://essensys.tech/our-terms
3. Schedule 1 – End User Policy: https://essensys.tech/eup
4. Schedule 2 – Connect Service Level Agreement: https://essensys.tech/connect-sla
<#if record.custbody_bbs_order_type != 'Equipment' && record.custbody_bbs_order_type != 'Operate' && subsidiary.id == "2">
<#setting number_format=",##0.00"> <#assign currencySymbol>${record.custbody_bbs_currency_symbol}</#assign> <#assign logoInfo>https://5423837-sb1.app.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=1942&c=5423837_SB1&h=1e9c8c9c705d4925337f</#assign>
